questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to King Veldaban on the top floor of Keldagrim Palace. (Chat 1•1•3•✓•2)
additionalStepInformation: If you have just finished King of the Dwarves, you must leave Keldagrim and come back or re-log to make Veldaban appear.

questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the records chamber cave to the west of the bank (along the west wall).
Talk to Lieutenant Brae. (Chat 1•3)
Talk to Vigr.
Talk to Brendt. (Chat 2•2)
Talk to Grundt. (Chat 3)
Talk to Brendt. (Chat 3•~•~)
Talk to Klaas. (Chat 1•1•2•3)
Go to the western 1st floor[US] of the Consortium and search the furnace in the north-eastern room. Read the bundle of letters.
Go to the King's Axe Inn, south of the bank, and talk to Meike. (Chat 1•1•1•2)
Return to the cave the suspects are in and talk to Vigr. (Chat 1•~)
Talk to Klaas. (Chat 1•~) read Additional Info before moving on.
additionalStepInformation: Don't forget to judge all the dwarfs and make sure they are gone. Otherwise you won't find Veldaban in the cave later on.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to King Veldaban. (Chat 1•1•2)
Go to the Taverley Dungeon and kill chaos dwarves south of the Lesser Demons until Ikadia the Exile appears.
After she talks to you and teleports away, go to the chaos druid circle in the north-eastern corner of the dungeon and talk to her. (Chat 2)
Defeat her and talk to her again. (Chat ~•~)
Go to the Yanille's Watchtower
additionalStepInformation: If you do not have the Watchtower quest completed, Climb-up the Trellis on the northern side of the Watchtower.

questSteps.stepDescription: Dismiss any followers you have, and talk to the Watchtower Wizard on the top floor. (Chat 1•~•1)
You'll be given a memory wand. Keep the wand for the rest of the quest, do not destroy it.
Use the wand on the 4 floating objects then catch all 16 loose memory fragments.

object.name: Floating Object 1 ( Birthright of the Dwarves )
Floating Object 2 ( Birthright of the Dwarves )
Floating Object 3 ( Birthright of the Dwarves )
Floating Object 4 ( Birthright of the Dwarves )

additionalStepInformation: Investigate each memory void. Based on the text that appears, use the corresponding memory fragment on the memory void following the table provided with the Image at step.

questSteps.stepDescription: After the cutscene, return to King Veldaban. (Chat 1•~•1•2•2)
additionalStepInformation: After this step you go to the caves but before that make sure you have talked to suspects in the record chamber and talk to Veldaban in his palace then in the caves.

questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the Barendir caves southeast of west Keldagrim.
additionalStepInformation: The caves can be accessed by selecting "Travel" on the Dwarven Boatman on the eastern side of Keldagrim near the northern bridge.
By choosing "Cross-river" on the Dwarven Ferryman to the south of western Keldagrim can also take you to the caves.

questSteps.stepDescription: Proceed to the north end of the tunnel and enter the cave at the end.
Talk to Veldaban. If Veldaban isn't there make sure the cave with suspects is empty.
Talk to Nulodion. He'll give you Explosive gears. Fire the cannon. Important information in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: This next part is not a safe death. Should you die, your gravestone will be a short walk inside the Barendir caves.

questSteps.stepDescription: Praying against range is strongly recommended. Stand behind the pillars to get the cannons to shoot them down to cross them, and sabotage each cannon as you progress.

object.name: Stand Here ( Birthright of the Dwarves

additionalStepInformation: The first one is to the west.
Do not stand near a cannon if it is about to explode, as it will hit for 5,000+ damage.

questSteps.stepDescription: After destroying all 5 cannons, walk up onto the platform with Grimsson.
Pull the lever and get in the mine cart.

Enter the cave ten after the cutscene, use the wand on the royal Red Axe standard (flag, west of Veldaban), the Zamorakian Chaplain, and the chaos dwarf standing next to him then collect all fragments
additionalStepInformation: Investigate each memory void. Based on the text that appears, use the corresponding memory fragment on the memory void following the table provided

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Veldaban.
In the next memory, use the wand on the two trolls directly next to Grimsson and repeat the memory fragment process following the table provided

npc.npcName: Small Troll ( Birthright of the Dwarves )
Dwarf Bone ( Birthright of the Dwarves )

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Grimsson (his dialogue won't appear while he's busy fending the trolls).
In the next memory, use the wand on Zamorak and repeat the memory fragment process.
In the next memory, use the wand on the 3 dwarves, catch the memory fragments only when they're not labelled "dangerous", and repeat the process following the table provided

npc.npcName: Chaos Dwarf ( Birthright of the Dwarves )
Grumpy Dwarf ( Birthright of the Dwarves )
Beardless Dwarf ( Birthright of the Dwarves )

questSteps.stepDescription: Kill Grunsh or let him go.
Enter the eastern doorway and go up to the 2nd floor[US].
Try to open the door with the chaos dwarf behind it.
Talk to one of the directors. (Chat 4)
Kill 7 of the 8 directors.
Talk to the remaining director.
Prepare for battle. Go upstairs to the top floor of the palace.
additionalStepInformation: You can teleport out at any time. When you return, the fight will resume from after the last person you killed.
If you place a dominion marker during the first phase of the fight, you will lose it. To retrigger the fight, enter the north cave in the Barendir tunnels.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Grimsson and begin the fight. (Chat 3)
Kill Chaos Grimsson.

object.name: Fight Area  Chaos Grimsson ( Birthright of the Dwarves )

additionalStepInformation: Use the Provoke defensive ability when he is attacking Veldaban to make him attack you instead.
If Veldaban dies, you will respawn outside the cave and need to re-enter and try again from the start.

questSteps.stepDescription: Kill Chaos Hreidmar. Then choose to Kill or Save Veldaban. ( Chat ~ )

object.name: Fight Area Chaos Hreidmar ( Birthright of the Dwarves )

additionalStepInformation: Try to lure and isolate him on the side with the stairs, just outside the main room.
When his adrenaline bar fills up and he's about to charge you, go down the stairs and wait for 10 seconds before coming back up.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak with any director.

object.name: Table of Directors ( Birthright of the Dwarves )

questSteps.stepDescription: Quest complete!
